string-array.name: jokeList
string-array.item: A small boy swallowed some coins and was taken to a hospital. When his grandfather telephoned to ask how he was a nurse said, \'No change yet\'.
Cartoonist found dead in home. Details are sketchy.
I wondered why the baseball was getting bigger. Then it hit me.

resources.string: This is a really long string that will be replaced never to be seen again when a joke view is added to the list.
